017
018package org.tquadrat.shootingtimer;
019
020import static java.lang.System.currentTimeMillis;
021import static javafx.application.Platform.runLater;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
025
026import org.apiguardian.api.API;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
028import javafx.concurrent.ScheduledService;
029import javafx.concurrent.Task;
030import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
031import javafx.util.Duration;
032
033/**
034 *  The service that will update the time display.
035 *
036 *  @version $Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
037 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
038 *  @UMLGraph.link
039 *  @since 0.1.0
040 */
041@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
042@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
043public class TimeUpdateService extends ScheduledService<Void>
044{
045        /*---------------*\
046    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
047        \*---------------*/
048    /**
049     *  The task that will update the time display.
050     *
051     *  @version $Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
052     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
053     *  @UMLGraph.link
054     *  @since 0.1.0
055     */
056    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TimeUpdateService.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
057    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
058    private class TimeUpdateTask extends Task<Void>
059    {
060            /*--------------*\
061        ====** Constructors **=================================================
062            \*--------------*/
063        /**
064         *  Creates a new {@code TimeUpdateTask} instance.
065         */
066        public TimeUpdateTask() { /* Just exists */ }
067
068            /*---------*\
069        ====** Methods **======================================================
070            \*---------*/
071        /**
072         *  {@inheritDoc}
073         */
074        @Override
075        public final Void call()
076        {
077            final var currentTime = currentTimeMillis();
078            final var remainingTime = currentTime < m_EndTime ? m_EndTime - currentTime : 0L;
079            if( m_ShowMinutes )
080            {
081                runLater( () ->
082                    {
083                        final var minutes = remainingTime / 60_000;
084                        final var seconds = (remainingTime / 1000) % 60;
085                        m_TimeDisplay.setText( "%d:%02d".formatted( minutes, seconds ) );
086                    } );
087            }
088            else
089            {
090                runLater( () -> m_TimeDisplay.setText( "%3.1f".formatted( remainingTime / 1000.0 ) ) );
091            }
092            if( (remainingTime <= 0L) || m_Stop ) cancel();
093
094            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
095            return null;
096        }   //  call()
097    }
098    //  class TimeUpdateTask
099
100        /*------------*\
101    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
102        \*------------*/
103    /**
104     *  The end time.
105     */
106    private final long m_EndTime;
107
108    /**
109     *  Flag that indicates if either minutes or seconds should be
110     *  displayed.
111     */
112    private final boolean m_ShowMinutes;
113
114    /**
115     *  The flag that stops the service.
116     */
117    private boolean m_Stop = false;
118
119    /**
120     *  The reference for the node that displays the time.
121     */
122    private final TextField m_TimeDisplay;
123
124        /*--------------*\
125    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
126        \*--------------*/
127    /**
128     *  Creates a new {@code TimeUpdateService} instance.
129     *
130     *  @param  endTime The end time.
131     *  @param  timeDisplay The reference for the node that displays the time.
132     */
133    public TimeUpdateService( final long endTime, final TextField timeDisplay )
134    {
135        m_EndTime = endTime;
136        m_TimeDisplay = requireNonNullArgument( timeDisplay, "timeDisplay" );
137        m_ShowMinutes = endTime - currentTimeMillis() > 350_000;
138        setPeriod( new Duration( 100 ) );
139    }   //  TimeUpdateService()
140
141        /*---------*\
142    ====** Methods **==========================================================
143        \*---------*/
144    /**
145     *  Stops the service.
146     */
147    public final void stop() { m_Stop = true; }
148
149    /**
150     *  {@inheritDoc}
151     */
152    @Override
153    protected final Task<Void> createTask() { return new TimeUpdateTask(); }
154}
155//  class TimeUpdateService
156
157/*
158 *  End of File
159 */
